alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Itasca, northern Aitkin, east central Cass, southeastern Koochiching, west central St. Louis and northeastern Crow Wing Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 357 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Effie, to 10 miles east of Marcell, to 7 miles southwest of Pokegama Dam, to near Outing, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pokegama Lake and Gunn around 405 AM CDT. Hill City around 415 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hibbing, Swan River, Nett Lake, Warba, Orr, Libby, Gheen, Pelican Lake and Cusson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
